name: hat
desc: Finally, you can indulge in everyone’s life-long desire of wearing pizza atop their head. Beware the sprinkled parmesan as you nod or shake your head, though—some might mistake it for dandruff.
features: Cool hat, protects you from the sun

name: pillow
desc: Nicolas Cage's face pillow or Nicolas Cage's face on a pillow.

name: ladybug
desc: Who says you can’t buy anything for under $10 anymore? In fact, Amazon shoppers can buy 1,500 crawling, flying somethings for the bargain price of a latte.
features: Now that's a lot of ladybugs
